name: Monty Hall Problem Sandbox (the three doors)
name_original: Monty Hall Problem Sandbox (the three doors)
description:
A small sandbox so you can play around with the Monty Hall problem (the three doors).

This game contains four modes:

Full AI mode: Let the AI simulate games at blazing speed

AI mode: let the AI select the door with the win

Two player mode: let a friend select the door with the win

Statistics mode: Check out the percentages of success for switching and keeping for each session of games you played (AI auto games don't enter in these statistics).

NOTE: the android version requires OpenGL 3 support to work, and although it should work on most modern devices, many devices barely support it, which may lead to graphical glitches.
